page.title: 06ABERDOUR AREA NEWS,MAY 1985
page.content: These are two cuttings from the{local {paper, The Dunfermline Press.}Friday 17th May 1985.{"Dalgety Bay Community {Council}has experienced some {difficulty}in getting it's books to{balance.}In fact, last year, it couldn't seem to help making a{profit! The{Council}took in{Â£1292}more than it spent, despite paying out{Â£825}in grants to{youth}and{leisure}groups, organising a{gala}that cost{Â£449}and publishing a{diary}at{Â£3914.}But it is not a situation the{council}is particurly happy about."The next {report}is about{Aberdour. "Aberdour {Amateur F.C.}recorded{one}win and{two draws from{three}games last week.Mrs.E.Brown and Mrs.J.B.Wilson {won}the{'Guid Neibours'domino tournament.{Â£145}was raised at an antiques fair for{The Royal National {Lifeboat Association.
